0.Major_Activities1: HIAL have become a national benchmark in innovation and alternatives educational pedagogies and learning systems. It has been awarded Global Award in Sustainable Architecture, 2017 in France, Terra Award, Lyon, its founder has been awarded Ramon Magsaysay award and several other prestigious awards in India and the world. But our major achievement is the unique paths that our students have carved for themselves in fields like film-making, entrepreneurship and politics and journalism.

source_info.purpose: We did not apply for Government funds but did crowd-funding on MILAAP
